channel.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
channel.description: Google? How did so many people find and join these forums? Wasn't it hard to advertise with JagEx out there?

item.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I would say the largest reason to moparscape success as its the only early community thats never been ‘hacked’ other communities were around very early but had mods dumping the databases and other stupid problems that shouldn’t occur.

That probably is a good reason too, most other communities I know either sell staff positions or give them away rather lightly. As everyone can tell from the small number of mods, and how slow they get promoted here, it’s something we take very seriously. Also, maybe I’m the only sysadmin that knows how to backup stuff?..

Read full topic

item.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:4, topic:365869”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=462057.msg3380653#msg3380653 date=1287990562]
The notion of thousands of party hats and gilded armour is what drew me to rsps. The first server I ever played was ‘CheatSkape’ which was on the very early moparscape webclient.
[/quote]
I guess you know marcopolo8?[/quote]

Indeed i did.

Read full topic

item.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:13, topic:365861”][quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=462057.msg3380194#msg3380194 date=1287960536]
Because Kaitnieks shut down and everyone came to Moparisthebest/Moparscape.
[/quote]
Well remember it was just Moparisthebest in the beginning before the split.[/quote]

That’s right, but many people found it by searching for moparscape. In fact, I’ve never advertised any of the sites, it just kind of happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:5, topic:365861”]Alright, here’s how I credit it’s size:

Back when private servers originated, Runescape was pretty difficult. Items, Gold, and high level’s weren’t as common to the player back then. The fact that a person could just press ::pickup 0995 214000000000 and have a max cash pile and easily get items(party hats, dragon chains, etc) brought many people in.

It continually grew up until when the wild was removed, and than so many people came.

Now, it’s starting to die out. Runescape is way to easy, levels are so easy to get, as well as cash.[/quote]Basically, Jagex sort of advertised for moparscape?

Read full topic

Also moparscape isn’t ran by kids…

item.title: Howd moparisthebest.com get so big?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Alright, here’s how I credit it’s size:

Back when private servers originated, Runescape was pretty difficult. Items, Gold, and high level’s weren’t as common to the player back then. The fact that a person could just press ::pickup 0995 214000000000 and have a max cash pile and easily get items(party hats, dragon chains, etc) brought many people in.

It continually grew up until when the wild was removed, and than so many people came.

Now, it’s starting to die out. Runescape is way to easy, levels are so easy to get, as well as cash.

Read full topic
